seller.description:
Hello! My name is Darshak, but I love to be called San! I'm an enthusiastic and creative graphic artist who is passionate about Logo and Banner Design! I am based in India & UAE. 

I'm a fun loving guy who loves nature, pets and dressing up! I'm also a bit of a perfectionist! 

I freelance exclusively on Fiverr!

reviews.comment:
I contacted San and offered an extra $15 to put me in the front of the queue for a speedy delivery. I had already designed my logo, I just needed him to make a few slight texture adjustments because I don't know how to use Photoshop. San got back to me promptly, but we immediately faced communication issues. I was explaining instructions very clearly, yet every delivery seemed to lack effort and attention to detail. What should have taken a couple of days max turned into a frustrating 45 day back and forth.

That said, I am (almost) completely happy with the final product. I reached a point at the end where I had to compromise and not be any more picky because some requests just simply weren't being met no matter how many times (and in how many different ways) I requested them.

San was very polite, but the attention to detail and instructions was lacking severely and I ultimately wish I went a different direction.

San is very professional and responds to your questions quickly.  His work and attention to details has brought me back to him for another business logo and designs to go with the logo for a 2nd business.  He designed a logo for a blog that I started 6 years ago.  When I started my new travel business, I knew he's the designer I wanted.  I didn't even look at any others on Fiverr.  He understood more from the description I gave him for my brand than I did.  He offered one option that looked exactly like I had described, but I felt the alternatives that he created were even better than what I was originally thinking.  Definitely 5 stars out of 5 stars!

San was very polite and responsive, sent all the source files, and was able to fix specific details when asked for a revision. At times it did feel like a game of whack-a-mole where one fix would cause another problem, which fell short of the advertised perfectionism (things like misaligned logos, lack of symmetry, different shades of colors). Overall I would use these services again, but it was a hands-on process from my end and caused me to wonder if I should have done it myself. By the end it did not feel like complete satisfaction, but rather that the errors were small enough to be acceptable.

The whole process took just 3 communications, and the design was absolutely nailed! I didn’t think I could love a simple logo as much as I do my new company design but SHEEESH do I like it 

San understood what I don’t think I could even explain into words I was imagining I wanted my logo to represent and look like. True talent and vision!

He ROCKS! I thought I was going to need to spends hundreds on a new logo for my business after multiple clients told me my current one was not the best LOL, I love them, The attention to detail is amazing, the way he delivered them is awesome, Will be recommending him to all of my partners and anyone reading this review GO WITH HIM. 10/10 If you could rate more stars I would!
Thank you, it was a pleasure working on your project!

consultationData.description: Hey! I am San, a graphic artist & I would love to connect with you for your new project! We can discuss the branding requirements of your new project along with your ideas, vision and my suggestions.

gigsData.title: create minimalist logo design for your business
do business card design letterhead and stationery
do premium minimalist line art logo design
do an outstanding logo animation video
